==== Notes ====
This tests were done using a LiveCD of the current Lucid Lynx daily build.
The LiveUSB exhibits the same BlackScreen on Startup as the HD install. This is (at least in my case) a known bug since Karmic.
The Beta1 I'm using is a the first available B1(for LiveCD) and the Upgraded A3 to B1 for non-LiveCD tests
